embeds.description:
Please use common sense, this is **NOT** and exhaustive list of rules, and they are subject to change at any time.
Staff reserve the right to punish for reasons not explicity listed here, if you believe you have been falsely punished, you may open a ticket to appeal [here](https://discord.com/channels/489424959270158356/639890173869555761).

If you have any questions, do not hesitate to DM a staff member.
ㅤ

fields.name: 1️⃣ Always respect your fellow members
fields.value:
Roblox Developers is a welcoming community for those of backround, race, gender and skill level.
__This means:__
- No being rude to people, especially in #help
- No Inflammatory messages, usernames/nicknames, and profiles (Ex. political and religious nicknames)
No one should ever feel unwelcome here. Please avoid conversations involving religion or politics. Feel free to use DMs or threads if you wish to discuss these topics in a peaceful and constructive manner.

If you are having issues with a member, you may always open a ticket https://discord.com/channels/489424959270158356/639890173869555761, please refrain from arguing in public spaces, take it somewhere else (DMs).

fields.name: 2️⃣ No discrimination of any kind
fields.value:
__This means:__
- No hate speech of any kind (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ablism, etc)
Roblox Developers is an inclusive space for all, and any kind of bigotry is completely forbidden.

**This includes:** messages, media, usernames/nicknames, and in voice chats.

fields.name: 3️⃣ Follow Discord ToS (https://discord.com/terms)
fields.value:
We are obligated to uphold the Discord Terms of Service, if you wish to report someone for violating Discord ToS you may open a ticket here [here](https://discord.com/channels/489424959270158356/639890173869555761)

We are not affiliated with Roblox, we *can not* and *will not* uphold Roblox ToS. You may always contact roblox at https://roblox.com/support.

:warning: **Please do not joke about breaking ToS, we will take you seriously**

fields.name: 4️⃣ No excessive swearing or vulgarity
fields.value:
Swearing and being vulgure is allowed, as long as it doesn't violate any of our rules, however please refrain from overusing swear words or being overly sexual.
No one wants to be in a server that's constantly talking about something inappropriate.

Furthermore, please refrain from direct swear words at anyone, it's disrespectful.

fields.name: 5️⃣ No NSFW or annoying content, or spam of any kind
fields.value:
Spamming the same message, video, gif, image, etc is annoying to other members.

NSFW content is any content that is sexually explicit or suggestive, violent or culturally inappropriate. Content includes messages, images, videos, gifs, etc. Roblox Developers' main audience are minors, so any content be it messages, media, or anything in voice channels that is sexual or innapropriate in nature is disallowed.
__This includes, but is not limited to:__
- Sex/sexual innuendos
- Drugs/alcohol (Any glorifying of drugs/alcohol, showing in any media, **in voice channels**, etc)
- Mild swearing is allowed, but anything deemed inappropriate will be moderated
**The above is not an exhaustive list**

Annoying content is defined as content that is excessively loud, flashy/bright and disruptive to the flow of chat.

fields.name: 6️⃣ Please use channels for their intended purposes
fields.value:
Every channel has a relevant name, and description if you need more information.
For example, the help channels are for asking or assisting people with questions, it is not a space for memes, general chatting or being rude to people.

Please do not DM staff members to post in a channel for you, or ask for permissions. If you have any questions do not hesitate to DM a staff member/

fields.name: 7️⃣ Do not advertise
fields.value:
Advertising here is defined as, the act of mentioning something in an attempt to get someone else to use or reserve it.

__Exceptions:__
- The channel topic allows it.
- It is directly related to and in response to a conversation.
- It does not directly or indirectly benefit you, would not be disruptive, and would be beneficial to a majority of members.

This includes advertising in members' direct messages using our server.

fields.name: 8️⃣ Do not loop-hole rules
fields.value:
Do not try to loop-hole the rules, this is __NOT__ and exhaustive list, use common sense.
Rules are subject to change at any time, and staff will moderate at their discretion.

If you believe you have been falsely punished, please open a ticket and calmly explain your situation.

author.name: Want to request a change? (Click me)

fields.name: Community safety comes first
fields.value: We will prioritize the safety of our members first. If you threaten our member's livelihood, financial state, or security, you will be removed from the server.

fields.name: Always listen to moderators
fields.value:
These rules are non-exhaustive and cannot account for every possible scenario. If a moderator asks you to stop doing something, listen to them.

Administrators are still moderators and must also be listened to.

fields.name: Rules are subject to change
fields.value:
The rules above may change at any time and without prior notice. You are responsible for ensuring you are always complying with them. Ignorance is not an excuse.

We may post an announcement when the rules have been updated.

fields.name: Failure to comply may result in more severe punishments
fields.value:
Generally, we will warn you verbally to stop first. If you continue, you may be:

- Given a more prominent warning that moderators can review in the future.
- Muted so you are unable to talk in the server for an amount of time.
- Roles may be taken away.
- You may be kicked.
- You may be banned.
- Reported directly to authorities for further investigation in extreme circumstances or if required by Discord.

fields.name: How to appeal a ban
fields.value:
We provide a Discord server to appeal bans. If you have been banned, you can appeal at: https://discord.gg/k9jVfFD

You cannot appeal on someone else's behalf, this is a voluntary service and we will not guarantee any response times or actions.
